00042 $Submenu= SetSubmenu('sites');
00043 
00044 switch ($Submenu) {
00045     case 'sites':
00046         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('ComixWall Web Filter uses site lists categorized in different packages for your convenience. You can enable or disable categories you want on this page.');
00047         break;
00048     case 'urls':
00049         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('ComixWall Web Filter uses URL lists categorized in different packages for your convenience. You can enable or disable categories you want on this page.');
00050         break;
00051     case 'phrases':
00052         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('ComixWall Web Filter uses phrase lists categorized in different packages for your convenience. You can enable or disable categories you want on this page.');
00053         break;
00054     case 'blacklists':
00055         require_once('blacklists.php');
00056         exit;
00057 }
